documentation.title: KoolTreeView Class [PHP]
documentation.metadescription: KoolTreeView is the excellent treeview control for PHP, combining highly-efficient rendering and AJAX Load on Demand support for superior performance.
documentation.metakeywords: php treeview, php tree view, php tree, ajax treeview, php ajax treeview

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: Get or set the width for treeview
property.longdesc: Get or set the width for treeview
property.samplecode: <?php $myTree->width="100px";//Specify width by pixels $myTree->width="100%";//Specify width by percent ?>

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: Get or set the height for treeview
property.longdesc: Get or set the height for treeview
property.samplecode: <?php $myTree->height="100px";//Specify height by pixels $myTree->height="100%";//Specify height by percent ?>

property.name: isSubTree
property.shortdesc: Set to true if current tree is under subtree request.
property.longdesc: Set to true if current tree is under subtree request.

property.name: multipleSelectEnable
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether treeview allows multiple nodes selection.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether treeview allows multiple nodes selection. User use Ctrl + leftmouse in order to select multinodes.

property.name: overflow

value.desc: Auto adding scroll when tree is longer or bigger than width and height.
Treeview will not display the scroll, overflow tree is hidden.

property.shortdesc: Get or set behavior when overflow happens.
property.longdesc: Get or set behavior when overflow happens.

property.name: keepState

value.desc: TreeView will not keep its state persisted.
TreeView will keep its state persisted only on the current page.
TreeView will keep its state persisted cross multiple pages.

property.shortdesc: Get or set how treeview will keep its state in cookie.
property.longdesc: Get or set how treeview will keep its state in cookie.
property.samplecode: <?php $myTree->keepState="onpage";//Keep state of the tree on the page. ?>

property.name: keepStateHours
property.shortdesc: Get or set the number of hours that treeview state will be kept in cookie.
property.longdesc: Get or set the number of hours that treeview state will be kept in cookie.

method.name: Add
method.samplecode:
<?php
	$kTree->Add("root","subnode","Sub Node",true,"Page.gif","theSubtree.php"); 
	//Add the child with text="Sub Node" and id="subnode" to the root node
	//The nodes expands at his initial state 
	//The node has page.gif in front of text 
	//When the node is open, the "theSubTree.php" will be loaded and put under "subnode" node 
?>
